item.title: UltraTech - TryHackMe
item.description: UltraTech is a medium difficult box on TryHackMe. Below are the steps I took to fully compromise this box. Task 1 just requires deploying the machine, there is no challenge to solve. Task 2 First, let’s run enumeration, the questions hint that non standard ports are used, so I ran nmap -p- [machine ip]. This took a bit to run since it was enumerating all the services on each port over the entire TCP port range.
